CustomField.formula:
IMAGE( IF( AND( LEN(TEXT(Tech_date_debut_conge_en_cours__c)) = 0, Tech_Number_Now__c > Tech_Number_Opening_Hour__c, Tech_Number_Now__c < Tech_Number_Closing_Hour__c, NOT( AND(Tech_Number_Now__c > Tech_Number_Start_Lunch_Hour__c ,Tech_Number_Now__c < Tech_Number_End_Lunch_Hour__c) )
) ,"/img/samples/flag_green.gif" , "/img/samples/flag_red.gif"),"Disponibilité")
CustomField.label: Disponibilité
